title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

God Bless Brian Kemp. Georgians opening slowly, responsibly, making up their own minds. Harvard Professor doesn’t want parents alone with their children. Trump didn’t tell people to drink Drano or inject Clorox. Drive-By Media always says Republicans are killing people. Oklahoman wonders what Washington would think. Sports media outraged NFL draftees violated social distancing. Tom Brady walks into wrong house in Tampa. Pelosi: Trump told people to inject Lysol. Trump was talking about UV light, not injecting disinfectants. UV light has long been used to kill viruses. Conformity has replaced curiosity for journalists. Biden predicts Trump will try to postpone election.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

HHS research on light, heat, humidity, disinfectant impacts on coronavirus. UV light as coronavirus treatment. Oklahoma governor opening state. CNN says the doctors convinced Trump to denounce Kemp. Colorado's Democrat governor praised, Georgia's GOP governor denounced. Georgia caller on Kemp. Democrats are convinced Biden will beat Trump because of virus. Biden's VP very likely to become president if he wins. Biden is worst Democrat candidate since Mondull. Pulmonary nurse: Chemo is a poison. Trump says he was being sarcastic about disinfectants.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

What's bothering Rush is we're sitting around and waiting instead of going on offense. Globalism was on the decline, America was on the rise until the virus hit. Kevin McCullough: Antibody testing proves we've been had. Report: Kim Jong-Il evacuated from Pyongyang. Michigan Trump supporter senses trouble because of massive spending. Frustration over America on defense. Georgia caller. Governors to extend lockdowns in two-week intervals until November.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
